channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-8322] VectorReduceSinkOperator: ClassCastException: ~StandardUnionObjectInspector$StandardUnion cannot be cast to ~IntWritable
item.description: Some queries with count(distinct(..)) fail now in VectorReduceSinkOperator.
item.summary: VectorReduceSinkOperator: ClassCastException: ~StandardUnionObjectInspector$StandardUnion cannot be cast to ~IntWritable

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
